title: Hello 2021 Americas | YouTube NYE Celebration
author: YouTube Originals
description:
Celebrate the most anticipated New Year in modern history with YouTube’s Hello 2021; a virtual celebration featuring J Balvin, Dua Lipa, YG, Karol G, Emma Chamberlain, Dude Perfect, Demi Lovato, hosts Juanpa Zurita and Storm Reid, and more. Watch now!
